import styled from 'styled-components' import fetch from 'isomorphic-unfetch' import Link from 'next/link' import { BrowserView, MobileView } from 'react-device-detect' import Layout from '../../../components/Layout' import NewLayout from '../../../components/NewLayout' import NewMobileLayout from '../../../components/NewMobileLayout' import MobileLayout from '../../../components/MobileLayout' import MobileCarousel from '../../../components/MobileCarousel' import FullDetails from '../../../components/FullDetails' import Details from '../../../components/Details' import NewDetails from '../../../components/NewDetails' import NewMobileDetails from '../../../components/NewMobileDetails' import DoughnutChart from '../../../components/DoughnutChart' import Table from '../../../components/Table' const TableRow = styled.div` display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; padding: 1.5rem; &:nth-child(even){ background-color: rgba(0,0,0,.1); } ` const CellHeader = styled.span` font-size: 1.4rem; font-weight: bold; ` const CellData = styled.span` font-size: 1.4rem; justify-self: end; ` const North = ({ data, sites }) => (
  • {site.BATTERY}
    • ) } company={"jct"} sitename={"North"} date={data[0].mDate} time={data[0].mTime} > Suction {data[0].D0} Stage 1 Discharge {data[0].D1} Stage 1 Discharge {data[0].D2} Stage 2 Discharge {data[0].D3}
    Suction {data[0].D0} Stage 1 Discharge {data[0].D1} Stage 1 Discharge {data[0].D2} Stage 2 Discharge {data[0].D3}
    ) export async function getServerSideProps(ctx){ const res1 = await fetch('http://localhost:3001/api/mammoth') const res = await fetch('http://localhost:3001/api/mammoth/mpc') const sites = await res1.json(); const data = await res.json(); return { props: { data, sites } } } export default North
